name: Backrooms Test (Vulpini Templar)
description:
You know of the backrooms so I shouldn't have to clarify anything for you but in case you're expecting anything beyond ceaselessly wandering around dingy rooms with obnoxious lighting, terrible smelling carpet and horrible taste in wallpapers you will be disappointed.

Controls:
W/A/S/D and/or Arrow keys to move
Shift to sprint burst

Furthermore:
I wanted to make a backrooms styled game but I didn't want to go with any of the bigger nuttier stuff that the community has come up with so this is the result, there's some performance issues here and there but otherwise I'm quite fond of how it turned out.
